channel.title: Cannot Open Server Files
channel.description:
Well,
This May Seem A Bit Of A Dumb Question Though, When I Download A Server Source To Make My Own I Cannot Open Vital Server Files(Client.Java, Player.Java Etc.) It Says The "Windows Cannot Open This File".
Also I've Tried Opening Using NotePad And It's Coded. Do I Need A Decompiler??
|Moran|

item.title: Cannot Open Server Files
item.dc:creator: @gs_pk_pure gs pk pure
item.description:
@gs_pk_pure wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:257691”]On XP (and probably Vista) Go on My Computer and go onto Help and then Folder Options.
Go onto the “File Types” tab and click “New”. Then type in the extention JAVA and press OK

After this find the JAVA File and click on Advanced below. Then make a New action at call it “edit” and use the program C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe
Then save and try to open the files[/quote]

if that does not work trry this, it is what i use to open my .cfg file formats becuase i cant open them any other way
http://www.soft82.com/download/windows/editplus/

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Open Server Files
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

On XP (and probably Vista) Go on My Computer and go onto Help and then Folder Options.
Go onto the “File Types” tab and click “New”. Then type in the extention JAVA and press OK

After this find the JAVA File and click on Advanced below. Then make a New action at call it “edit” and use the program C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe
Then save and try to open the files

Read full topic
